name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with long battery life and adjustable DPI.
review: Great for office work and light gaming, comfortable to use for long hours.

name: 4K Monitor
description: Ultra HD 27-inch monitor with 4K resolution, 60Hz refresh rate, and HDMI support.
review: Excellent picture quality and color accuracy, perfect for graphic design and video editing.

name: Gaming Keyboard
description: Mechanical RGB gaming keyboard with customizable lighting and macro keys.
review: Responsive keys and vibrant RGB effects, great for gaming enthusiasts.

name: External SSD
description: Portable 500GB external SSD with USB-C support, up to 1050MB/s read speed.
review: Super fast and reliable, a must-have for quick backups and transfers.

name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Wireless over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.
review: Outstanding sound quality and noise isolation, perfect for travel and work.

name: Smartphone
description: iPhone 13 Pro with 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, and 5G support.
review: Smooth performance and excellent camera quality, but a bit pricey.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound and waterproof design.
review: Great sound quality for its size, perfect for outdoor use.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Health and fitness smartwatch with heart rate monitoring and GPS.
review: Accurate tracking with a wide range of features, battery life could be better.

name: Laptop Stand
description: Adjustable aluminum laptop stand with ergonomic design for better posture.
review: Sturdy and well-built, helps reduce neck strain while working.

name: Smartwatch
description: Galaxy Watch 4 with fitness tracking, ECG monitoring, and sleep analysis.
review: Sleek design and full of features, integrates well with Android devices.
